system.sustained: The Psyker performs a 30 minute ritual, drawing Tarot cards, casting runes, or some other method of divination. After the 30 minutes they make a Focus Power Test, projecting their vision over a wide area or battlefield to divine its future. Results based on Degrees of Success, with each revealing further information: 0 DoF: A Single Key manuevre of significant importance that the enemy plans to make is revealed to the psyker. 1 DoF: The Psyker sees the movements of allied and enemy troops, but cannot see their movement or makeup. 2 DoF: The Psyker can determine the number and makeup of allied and enemy units. 3 DoF: The Psyker knows the details of the enemy commander's Battle Plans.
